relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: XMF, eXtensible Music File Format, Version 1.0
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">sound</field><field name="filenameExtension">xmf, mxmf </field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: Wrapper format for MIDI, Downloadable Sounds (DLS), and WAVE waveform data.  The most popular use of XMF is for mobile phone content, via the Mobile XMF variant.
